Patrick Oketch bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri nke a maara maka igwu Charlie na usoro ihe nkiri Citizen TV Mother-in-Law  O gosikwara Field Ruwe na obere ihe nkiri afọ 2015 Intellectual Scum A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1981 na Mathare Slums, Patrick bụ onye nkuzi a zụrụ azụ ugbu a na-achọ nzere na Theatre Studies na Film Technology na Mahadum Kenyatta
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ede edemede na onye nchịkọta ederede maka ihe ngosi MaEmpress na Maisha Magic.
